stages.name: Main Stage
stages.description: The main performance stage featuring headlining acts with state-of-the-art sound and lighting systems. Located at the heart of the festival grounds.
stages.accessibility: Wheelchair accessible viewing area available. ASL interpreters available upon request.
stages.sound_system: Meyer Sound LEO Family line array system with 120dB peak output
stages.lighting: Full LED lighting rig with moving lights, strobes, and pyrotechnics
stages.backstage_facilities: Artist lounges, production offices, equipment storage, catering area

stages.name: Electronic Tent
stages.description: Climate-controlled tent venue specifically designed for electronic music with immersive visual experiences and premium sound quality.
stages.accessibility: Ramped entrance, accessible restrooms, designated wheelchair viewing area
stages.sound_system: Funktion-One Resolution system optimized for electronic music
stages.backstage_facilities: DJ green room, technical production area, storage

stages.name: Acoustic Garden
stages.description: Intimate outdoor venue nestled among trees, perfect for acoustic performances, folk music, and singer-songwriter sets. Natural amphitheater setting.
stages.accessibility: Accessible pathways, some uneven terrain, portable accessible seating available
stages.sound_system: d&b audiotechnik Y-Series for pristine acoustic reproduction
stages.lighting: Minimal warm LED lighting to preserve natural ambiance
stages.backstage_facilities: Simple green room, instrument storage, tuning area

stages.name: Bass Valley
stages.description: High-energy outdoor stage dedicated to bass-heavy music including dubstep, drum & bass, and trap. Known for ground-shaking sound and wild crowd energy.
stages.accessibility: Accessible viewing platform, ear protection recommended
stages.backstage_facilities: Artist trailer compound, equipment prep area

stages.name: Silent Disco Dome
stages.description: Unique geodesic dome housing the silent disco experience with multiple DJ channels and wireless headphones. Perfect for late-night dancing without noise restrictions.
stages.accessibility: Fully accessible entrance and interior, headphone adjustment assistance available
stages.sound_system: Silent Events wireless headphone system with 500m range
stages.lighting: Interactive LED dome ceiling that responds to music
stages.backstage_facilities: DJ prep room, equipment storage, headphone maintenance area

stages.name: Local Spotlight Stage
stages.description: Intimate stage dedicated to showcasing local and emerging artists. Features a community vibe with close artist-audience interaction.
stages.accessibility: Level ground access, folding chairs available
stages.sound_system: JBL Professional compact system suitable for emerging artists
stages.lighting: Simple but effective LED wash lighting
stages.backstage_facilities: Shared green room, instrument storage, artist networking area

stages.name: Chill Zone Pavilion
stages.description: Relaxed pavilion space for ambient music, meditation sessions, yoga classes, and recovery. A peaceful escape from the festival energy.
stages.lighting: Soft, warm lighting with color therapy options
stages.backstage_facilities: Wellness practitioner prep area, equipment storage

stages.name: Comedy Corner
stages.description: Intimate comedy venue featuring stand-up comedians, improv groups, and humorous musical acts. Theater-style seating for optimal comedy experience.
stages.accessibility: Reserved accessible seating, assistive listening devices available
stages.sound_system: Speech-optimized sound system with crystal clear vocals
stages.lighting: Professional comedy lighting with spotlight capabilities
stages.backstage_facilities: Comedian green room, prop storage, practice area
